lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra high performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in some of the most severe on and off-highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and after treatment systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Greater engine efficiency when compared to conventional lubricants; helps reduce low temperature sludge build up and high temperature deposits; helps lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.name: Mobiltrans™ HD
products.information: Extra high performance transmission and drive-train lubricants engineered to meet the rigorous specifications required by CAT TO-4
products.benefits: Helps maximize clutch life; increased levels of anti-wear and load carrying capability help extend component life; helps control brake chatter; excellent thermal and oxidation stability for long oil life; very good low temperature pumpability which helps to maximize lubrication at low start-up temperatures

products.name: Mobil™ Hydraulic 10W
products.information: High performance hydraulic oil formulated from advanced base oils and a balanced additive system designed to satisfy a wide range of heavy-duty hydraulic equipment requirements.
products.benefits: Effective low and high ambient temperature performance due to high viscosity index; excellent oxidation resistance delivers good performance at higher temperatures which helps to extend operating intervals; high levels of anti-wear protection help extend equipment life and fewer breakdowns

products.name: Mobilube™ HD
products.information: High performance, heavy-duty gear lubricants engineered for automotive applications including heavy-duty axles and final drives where extreme pressures and shock loading are expected
products.benefits: Helps maximize equipment life and optimize operating costs of higher speed, higher torque, and heavier loaded automotive gearboxes

subcomponents.name: Grease lubricated components such as bearings

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions, including industrial, automotive, construction and marine sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high drop point helps provide extended relubrication intervals; resistance to water contamination aids in improving equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions, including industrial, automotive, construction and marine sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high drop point helps provide extended relubrication intervals; resistance to water contamination aids in improving equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions, including industrial, automotive, construction and marine sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high drop point helps provide extended relubrication intervals; resistance to water contamination aids in improving equipment reliability

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Outstanding load-carrying and anti wear properties for improved equipment reliability and life; can replace grease in some applications; high viscosity index and low traction properties help improve equipment energy efficiency in many gear drives compared with conventional reference oils

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Helps improve equipment productivity due to potential for reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; helps extend oil life; by reducing friction, helps improve energy efficiency compared with mineral oils

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions, including industrial, automotive, construction and marine sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high drop point helps provide extended relubrication intervals; resistance to water contamination aids in improving equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: Synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; excellent thermal stability and oxidation resistance; helps maximize re-greasing interval when compared to conventional oils, which can potentially reduce service costs

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Electric-motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Advanced thickener formulation for improved bearing performance and protection for long electric motor life; excellent corrosion resistance; low-noise properties

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 20
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils designed to satisfy a wide range of hydraulic equipment requirements
products.benefits: Helps keep hydraulic systems clean by preventing valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to help improve equipment reliability and life compared to ExxonMobil’s standard hydraulic fluids, which can reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs; shear stability-enabling oil to maintain system efficiency and equipment protection at both high and low temperatures

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 10M
products.information: Premium performance anti-wear hydraulic oils engineered for wide temperature range applications
products.benefits: Excellent shear stability helps enable oil to maintain system efficiency and equipment protection at both high and low temperatures; helps keep hydraulic systems clean, which prevents valve sticking; controls contamination and provides wear protection to help improve equipment reliability and life;  can help reduce both maintenance costs and product disposal costs

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Electric-motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Advanced thickener formulation for improved bearing performance and protection for long electric motor life; excellent corrosion resistance; low-noise properties

products.name: Mobilgrease™ XTC
products.information: High speed coupling grease
products.benefits: Helps to maximize coupling reliability and life due to its adhesive, low bleed and high temperature stability properties

products.name: Mobilux™ EP 111
products.information: Coupling grease
products.benefits: Helps to maximize coupling reliability and life due to its low bleed and wear protection properties

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra high performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in some of the most severe on and off-highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and after treatment systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Greater engine efficiency when compared to conventional lubricants; helps reduce low temperature sludge build up and high temperature deposits; helps lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1600
products.information: High performance monograde diesel engine oils formulated from advanced technology base oils and a balanced additive system. They are specifically engineered for performance in intercooled, turbo-charged engines operating under severe on and off-highway conditions
products.benefits: Helps protect against oil thickening, high temperature deposits, sludge build-up, oil degradation and corrosion, long-term deposit/wear control, helps control formation of acids when using higher sulfur fuels

products.name: Mobil Rarus SHC™ 1020
products.information: Synthetic rotary screw compressor oils
products.benefits: Helps extend service life, reduce deposits, provide long oil life, lower maintenance costs, reduce wear of components

products.name: Mobil Rarus™ 800
products.information: Synthetic compressor oils
products.benefits: Suitable for reciprocating and rotary screw compressor with the lower viscosity grades used mainly in rotary screw compressors; higher viscosity grades used in reciprocating compressors help reduce deposits on valves in these compressors to reduce the potential for fires and explosions compared to mineral oil products
